price: 17. (Alle) waa Rabbiga labada bari iyo Rabbiga labada galbeed2.
footnotes: 2. Waa halka iyo dhibcaha ay ka soo baxaan qorraxda subaxii dhanka bari iyo halkay u dhacaan galabkii xilliyada jiilaalka iyo xagaayada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
